name: Fennel Sauce With Anchovies And Capers
keywords: anchovy fillets, capers, fennel, orange juice, parsley, yukon gold potato
recipeIngredient: 1/2 bulb fennel with leaves, finely diced
2 baby Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled, boiled and riced (about 1/3 cup)
2 tablespoons poaching liquid from bass recipe
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saute pan, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add fennel, onion and garlic, and cook until softened but still crisp, about 2 minutes.

In a medium bowl, combine fennel mixture, riced potatoes, anchovies and capers. Whisk in orange juice, vinegar, poaching liquid and remaining olive oil until emulsified. Stir in parsley. Season with salt and pepper. Spoon over poached bass.
